title: 158. Is Learning a Foreign Language Really Worth It?
description: Yes, it expands the mind but we usually don't retain much -- and then there's the opportunity cost.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: Yes, it expands the mind but we usually don't retain much -- and then there's the opportunity cost.
